name: Necro Hunter
description:
EDIT: 6/1/22 Bug Fix: I added a sensitivity slider in the menu options. Press "esc" key in a level to change the sensitivity. As I type this, I realize this setting will revert back between levels. I'll work on that next, lol.

This game was made for the GameDev.TV 2022 Game Jam. It was made by Matt Beebe and Cal Aylward.

Explore each level to find the evil necromancer that is spawning monsters. Defeat the necromancer and all of his minions on each level to progress to the next.

Push escape during the levels to exit to the main menu.

WASD = move

Left mouse button = fire

Spacebar = jump

This game was made in 10 days for the game jam, so there are some bugs and lacking features. Thanks for playing!
